name: Galvantula

passive.name: Electroweb
passive.effect: If the Defending Pokemon switches during your opponent's turn, the new Defending Pokemon's attacks have no effect on Galvantula, including damage.

attacks.name: Signal Beam
attacks.effect: Deals 80 damage minus 10 for each damage counter on Galvantula.

flavor: These massive tarantulas are horribly misunderstood, they make for loyal allies to the non-arachnaphobic trainer.
